Class IdentityBuilder

public Identity build()

                                  ErrorResponseException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Build the IdentityImpl This is deprecated, see build(boolean useBlocking)
        Returns:
        The IdentityImpl
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided token is not valid.
        java.io.IOException - If there is any connection issue.
        ErrorResponseException

      • build

        public Identity build(boolean useBlocking)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      ErrorResponseException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Build the IdentityImpl (Can choose blocking or not)
        Parameters:
        useBlocking - To block the thread or not
        Returns:
        The IdentityImpl
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided token is not valid.
        java.io.IOException - If there is any connection issue.
        ErrorResponseException

      • setIdentityType

        public IdentityBuilder setIdentityType(IdentityType type)
        Define the identity type to be build. This method must be used before building the identity.
        Parameters:
        type - Bot or Human
        Returns:
        IdentityBuilder for chaining.

      • useToken

        public IdentityBuilder useToken(java.lang.String token)
        Define the token of this identity. This method must be used before building the identity.
        Parameters:
        token - The token from Discord Bot application page or user token.
        Returns:
        IdentityBuilder for chaining.

      • isTokenValid

        public boolean isTokenValid()
        Validate the current token. Note that if the IdentityType is not set, then this will always returns false.
        Returns:
        True if the token is valid.
